topics.body:
So I'm pretty sure my science partner was high today; our school requires that we wear IDs with our names on them at all times and I've decorated the back of mine with some G3 stickers (give me a break, they were cute). So I'm testing some substances for certain enzymes while my partner is sprawled across our table and she starts going "hey, hey, are you a brony? _mad giggling_ Do you know what that is? I like...I like Double Rainboom..." So I told her that I enjoy the show but don't really consider myself a brony (I mean, I kind of do...it's complicated), and then she starts on about how she wants to get home and starts giggling like hell again, talking about the testing powder I was using and what would happen if she drank the enzyme-testing substance.

Weird.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

Damn!
I missed that _This Day Aria_ song and that Celestia vs Chrysalis laser battle in Japanese.
Some people have been spreading some rumor that the Japanese are going to cut of the show at 52 episodes, which is the end of season 2...
However, The Crystal Empire episodes appear to be on the episodes listening right now... and the fact that they are getting the Princess Twilicorn toy in Japan might say otherwise.
